title: MindPeers: Online Therapy
description:
Manage stress, relationships & anxiety with verified online therapy & counseling

Can’t find a good match for therapy or counselling? Make it a cakewalk with MindPeers. With 100+ certified and expert therapy and counseling providers, finding one that fits you and your needs is easy. We have therapy and counselling services for everything, from anxiety and stress to family therapy and couples counseling. Whatever stress you’re going through, we have a therapist to help you.

Therapy is for everyone, and we are committed to making therapy and counseling accessible.
We provide:
100+ therapists and counselors
Flexible slots that you choose as per your needs
Flexible modes of online therapy and counseling- video, audio and chat
Affordable prices, so you get a bang for your buck

Key features:
✨Tailored Counseling and Therapy:
All of our therapists are skilled and practice various therapy modalities from CBT, REBT, and DBT to unique therapy and counseling practices like art and expressive arts therapy, and animal assisted therapy.

✨Flexible Online Sessions:
Enjoy the convenience of online therapy sessions, available through video, audio, and chats. Achieve personal growth on your terms, with counselling and therapy services tailored to your preferences. No stress about timing!

✨Expertise Across Categories:
We have therapy and counseling services for anxiety, depression, everyday stress, ADHD, work conflict, relationship stress, career counseling, couples counseling and family therapy, as well as, queer friendly and affirming, trauma informed therapy.

✨24/7 Access:
Your well-being knows no bounds, and neither does our app. Enjoy 24/7 access to our service therapy and counselling team. We will ensure you receive support exactly when you need it!

Our #2 most loved feature:
✨Mental health tests:
Made with clinical precision, our tests help you find answers to your mood, sleep concerns, stress levels, depression, anxiety triggers and more.

✨Symptom checkers:
Tried looking up symptoms like stress, sleep tracking, time management, habit breakers: stop right here. Take our clinically validated tests to find out more.

✨Personality tests:
Uncover the universe within you. Raise your self awareness and confidence with data, insights and reports that are clinically backed and easy to understand.

What you get when you choose MindPeers:
✨Seamless User Experience:
Navigate our user-friendly interface effortlessly as you explore our diverse selection of therapy and counselling offerings. Stress free browsing.

✨Privacy and Security:
Your confidentiality is our priority. Enjoy a secure platform where you can engage with counseling and therapy services with confidence.

Discover the power of counseling and therapy as you embark on a journey of growth, resilience, and stress relief. Google Fit, Apple Health, and FitBit integration supported.

Pricing, Payments, and Renewal:

MindPeers Clubs plans:
Monthly Membership Plan- Validity for 1 month
Yearly Membership Plan- Validity for 1 year

Note:
1. Payment will be charged to your iTunes account upon purchase confirmation. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

2. The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.

3. After purchasing, you can manage or disable auto-renewal in your account settings at any time.

4. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active period.

Terms & Conditions: https://mindpeers.co/terms-and-conditions
Privacy policy: https://mindpeers.co/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://mindpeers.co/terms-and-use
